info.author: Liang Zhang lzhang13@memphis.edu
info.abstract: ImportXAPI used for querying an LRS, filter functions of original study statements and then produce Tab-delimited format file that accepted by DataShop
info.details:
1.First, access to the LRS. The url, username, and password of LRS are needed.
2.Secondly, use the Filter functions to point to some specific group of target xAPI statements. The FilterValue corresponds to the id value from xAPI statement
3.Thirdly, query the specific information by QueryPath. The QueryPath refers to the serious nodes of Json-structured xAPI statement. For example, QueryPath can be "actor,name", can be "verb,display,en-US", can be "context,extensions,http://autotutor.x-in-y.com/AT,timeTaken" and so on
4.Forthly, rename the headers. The headers refers to the actual headers name that will display in the column of the output tabular data. You may define whatever you want
info.outputs: xAPI_Query.txt- The table for queried xAPI statements
info.Options:
Url-the url of LRS
Username- the username of LRS
Password- the password of LRS
Filter-filterByVerb,filterByActor,filterByActivity,filterByRegistration,filterBySince,filterByUntil
FilterValue- the correspodning id of Filter funtions
